title: Have More and More!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Hey Rina. How many things do we have in common again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Umm.... We both like games and hamburgers.... We both feel at ease in quiet and empty places.... And we have similar nicknames, Rinako and Miako. So that’s 3.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>3, huh.... I thought we’d have more, seeing how well we get along.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Then.... let’s find more.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah, let’s. Do you like baseball, Rina?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’ve never seen it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eeeeeeh!? Y-, you’ve never.... seen it? Baseball....? You’re saying that even though it’s like a national sport here.... you’ve never seen it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hmm.... I don’t think so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Let’s go watch a game right now, Rina. I’ll explain it to you. Ah, we also need to buy hotdogs, cola, and tacos. I’m sure you’ll come to like it too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I want to have.... more things in common with you, Mia-chan. So please.... teach me about baseball. Rina-chan’s board「Bowing」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
